comment_text: That's taking a pretty kind view of the Fed's adherence to the Constitutional limits on its power.  If it were important enough to the Federal government, Congress could  use the club of taxation and federal grants to force the states to toe the line.  See for example the peculiar uniformity in laws related to the drinking age, drivers' licenses, etc.; see also the questionable legality of the Affordable Care Act.
